alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Carroll, southeastern Jo Daviess and southwestern Stephenson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Massbach, or 9 miles northwest of Mount Carroll, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, minor flooding and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Slowing or redirecting of traffic due to ponding or flowing water. Closure of waterfront access due to flooding. Locations impacted include... Loran, Willow, and Elmoville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
